EmailTemplate.name: 2016Q3.Global.NUR.2034.Small Cells.Email 5 - Unlicensed Band Ultra-Dense Network
EmailTemplate.subject: One step away from ultra-dense networks
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A look at ultra-densification strategies Network densification with small cells
Understanding ultra-dense network deployment challenges and solutions Small cells provide lower cost capacity and coverage for outdoor mass events and indoor public spaces, and are the first steps towards an ultra-dense network. Download the whitepaper <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200295]]> ► By 2025 or 2030, Nokia expects ultra-dense networks to cover most urban indoor and outdoor areas with small cells providing cell edge data rates of 100 Mbps to everyone. Ultimately, these networks will support and enable the Internet of things (IoT) that will transform the way we live, work, and play. A complete understanding of the technologies that will enable network densification will enable more informed investments and make the move towards ultra-dense networks easier. © 2016 Nokia.
